nodes.text: Inntak was a male Rodian bounty hunter.

A member of the dominant Chattza Clan—though with little clan loyalty—he only took bounties for rogue Rodians and those that had angered Navik the Red. Inntak maintained a secret contact with Entukan Yesosko, leader of the Rodian Galactic Drama Troupe, who informed him whenever wanted Rodians attended their performances.
